Posts.Content: Nov 1, 2008 08:26PM ozzie wrote: Hi I have just been diagnosed with Paget's. My MRI showed no underlying problem. I see the surgeon on Wednesday. From what I understand that is one of the best cancers to have as it is non invasive (at least I'm hoping so)  Have all your family members had Pagets????
